Subject: Daycoval - Excel behaving strangely when policy is enabled
Description:
Hello Team,

We are facing a strange behavior where the excel process get slower, like changing cells and using clipboard when a specific policy is enabled. When its disable, works properly. The excell file is on the computer, so no issues with network sharing, and the policy doesnt show any report, so we cant troubleshoot normally. Let me know if you can join a meeting today 14h BRT or another time of your availability this week.

Best regards,
What_We_Know__c:
4/23/2025
- Sent customer follow up email requesting available days and times to schedule a remote session

4/17/2025

- Joined remote session
- Customer did not join 
- Resent Zoom link to customer to join
- Waited 40 min and ended session
- Sent customer follow up email to attempt to reschedule for next week
Solution_Comment__c: Have attempted to reach out to customer multiple times with no answer. Sent email stating to contact us if issue is still present. Closing case
